PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-10322017-07-14,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of LILI-ANNA PEREŠA of Montréal, Quebec, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board for Supreme Court of Canada Judicial Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of LILI-ANNA PEREŠA of Montréal, Quebec, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board for Supreme Court of Canada Judicial Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
